titles.title: United States Customs Service Employees Protection Act of 1995
To amend section 1114 of title 18, United States Code, to extend its protections to United States Customs Service employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 12/7/1995--Introduced. United States Customs Service Employees Protection Act of 1995 - Amends the Federal criminal code to make provisions setting penalties for killing or attempting to kill any Federal judge, United States Attorney, or other specified officers or employees of the United States applicable to killing or attempting to kill a U.S. Customs Service employee or a person assisting such an employee in the execution of his or her duties.
